content.question: After the Revolution, the concept of the “republican mother” suggested that

choices.label: women would be responsible for raising their children, especially their sons, to be virtuous citizens of the young republic
voting would soon become a privilege granted to educated and/or married women
the first duty of mothers was to serve the needs of government
wives and mothers would be welcome in the emerging political parties
women’s virtues had been the inspiration for the ideals of the Revolution

content.answer: women would be responsible for raising their children, especially their sons, to be virtuous citizens of the young republic

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
